item.title: CVE-2024-3659|2024-08-08T12:24:46.674Z -- kaon%20group -- ar2140
item.description: Firmware in KAONÂ AR2140 routers prior to version 4.2.16 is vulnerable to a shell command injection via sending a crafted request to one of the endpoints. In order to exploit this vulnerability, one has to have access to the administrative portal of the router.
